quote: It was unbelievably hot—felt like 50°C. I didn't know the course at all. By the end, I had cramps in my legs. In the first 28km, I wasn't even trying to attack, but I found myself leading at the top of a climb and just kept my own pace. I'm so happy to have won.

It was a tough route, and the heat was intense. My legs weren't at their best after racing in Colombia last week. The pace was high and only kept increasing. I even had to stop at the feed zone to grab water and cool off.
